description: Allows the user to sprout duplicates of their body parts on any surface.

abilityReveals.description: Robin sprouts one hundred arms to create a defensive formation protecting allies from attacks.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Robin uses this technique to protect the crew during their escape from Enies Lobby.

abilityReveals.description: Robin sprouts arms on a target's body and uses them to bend the target backwards, breaking bones.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Robin uses Clutch to break Spandam's spine as revenge for his abuse.

users.circumstances: Robin ate the fruit as a child

description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

abilityReveals.description: Luffy's rubber body is stretched by Zoro and Sanji to catch incoming cannonballs and launch them back at enemies.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used creatively during the escape from Enies Lobby to turn enemy attacks against the Marines.

users.circumstances: Luffy accidentally ate the fruit as a child
